Cmp3\Data

Interface MetaInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:

MetaGeneric, MetaAbstract
public interface MetaInterface

Provides meta data information for fields of a table
That is meant to be used in xml field attributes like this <field name="header" type="text" format="line" meta="header">

Method Summary

 Field GetFieldDefinition(string $strFieldName)

public Field GetFieldDefinition(string $strFieldName)

Returns the a fields data definition to be used in cmp3 xml
